name: Calculating a score of my school's marking system
description:
Story:

My English teacher grades our Reading Comprehension Paper with content marks and tallies.

Every question, she awards us some number of content marks and tallies.

2 tallies = 1 content mark

So every tally you get decreases your score by 0.5 and every content mark increases you score by 1.

But sometimes, my score for a question is less than 0!

In that case, my teacher will award 0 marks for than question.

Task:

You are given a list for each question in the Reading Comprehension of any length.

Format: [```[no. of content marks, no. of tallies], ..., [no. of content marks, no. of tallies]```]

Just return the ```number of marks``` I got in the paper.

```[[1, 1], [1, 3], [5, 1]] returns 5```

```[[3, 5], [4, 2]] returns 3.5```

Rules:

- You must do it in one line only
- Must be less than 50 characters


P.S. I am still in primary/elementary school just in case you were wondering why I was using present tense.
